titleStmt.title: A proclamation declaring His Majesties pleasure touching His Royal Coronation, and the solemnity thereof James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Mary, of Modena, Queen, consort of James II, King of England, 1658-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King, a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall the sixth day of March 1684/5.
